note.value: The poor condition of the undertext does not allow a complete folio by folio text identification; however, the content of the identified folia can be summarized as follows: 1) Stichera for the fixed year; 2) Stichera for the movable paschal cycle; 3) Octotonal hymnody of the Sunday Vigil service

Bibliography: G. Rossetto, Greek Palimpsests at Saint Catherine's Monastery (Sinai): Three Euchologia as Case Studies, Vienna 2022 ; SAV = Chr. Troelsgård, A List of Sticheron Call-Numbers of the Standard Abridged Version of the Sticherarion. Part I (The Cycle of the Twelve Months). Cahiers de l’Institut du Moyen-Âge Grec et Latin 74 (2003) 3–20 ; Vind. Theol. gr. 136 = G. Wolfram, Sticherarium antiquum Vindobonense: Codex theol. gr. 136 Bibliothecae Nationalis Austriacae phototypice depictus. Pars principalis & Pars suppletoria. Vienna 1987 ; Floros 1970, Universale Neumenkunde. I–III. Kassel 1970
